amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to state that in regards to WRDA funding determinations, the Corps of Engineers may consider operation and maintenance of the locks on Allegheny River for purposes of recreational boat traffic levels and related economic benefits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Kelly (PA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
